DOC.brief_summary: The purpose postmarket study gather data evaluate impact use Eeva traditional morphology grade clinical pregnancy rate .
DOC.brief_title: Eeva™ Pregnancy Investigational Clinical Study : A Postmarket Follow-Up Study
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose postmarket study gather data evaluate impact use Eeva traditional morphology grade clinical pregnancy rate , compare matched case control group use morphology grade select embryo transfer .
DOC.criteria: Women undergo fresh vitro fertilization treatment use egg donor egg . IVF cycle attempt ≤ 3 . Egg age ≤ 40 year . Planned Day 3 embryo transfer . At least 5 normally fertilize egg ( 2PN ) . All 2PN embryo must image Eeva . Normal uterine cavity evaluate standard method . Fertilization use ejaculated sperm ( fresh frozen ) surgically remove sperm . Willing comply study protocol procedure . Willing provide write informed consent . Planned preimplantation genetic diagnosis . Planned `` freeze '' cycle ( oocytes embryos ) . Concurrent participation another clinical study .
